home:welcome:text: Our site is still under development, products and prices are not real yet, but you can have glance on your future food ordering experience, try it out by adding sandwiches, pizzas or any product to your cart
about:page_content:1: A fast food restaurant providing a variety of delicious sandwiches, pizzas, tacos and much more. Located in the commercial neighborhood in M'saken, we strive to bring quality food and service to our community. Our site is available in several languages, you can modify it using the icon in the navigation bar
about:page_content:2: We are the first to offer online delivery service in M'saken, our goal is to provide a fun unique way to order your favorite meals. We offer to our transporters the best working conditions by providing a mobile app helping them organize the delivery of your orders to reduce waiting time
about:page_content:3: We have a loyalty program available that allows you to win points that you can use to buy promo codes. You earn loyalty points by inviting your friends or when buying certain products, the number of points you can earn are displayed on the product
about:page_content:4: Your earned points are exchangeable for promo codes containing discounts with various amounts on your orders
about:page_content:5: Your feedback is important to us, we would be happy to hear about your experiences with us
common:error:happened: There was an error, please try again later
